column2:
"I see ...it's more effective to drive and
force the enemy to a corner than
purely attacking it."

"I think I understood by observing but it
was surprising to easily understand the
dash move attack than I expected. "

"As expected, I learnt a great deal by
watching in battle."

"Thank you, Boss.
See you next time, goodbye."

"なるほど……強引に攻めるよりも
相手の死角を突くべきなんだな。"

"見てて分かったけど
あの飛びかかってくる攻撃って
案外、動きが分かり易いんだな。"

"やっぱり、センパイの戦い方は
すごく参考になるな。"

"ありがとな、センパイ。
また、よろしく。"
